present_findings.finding: 629 districts show ESS > 75th percentile, indicating delayed adult enrollment. Mean ESS = 0.024.
present_findings.evidence: Top 10 districts by ESS: 100000, Leparada, Mangan, Pakke Kessang, Khawzawl, Saitual, Namchi, Deeg, Kurung Kumey, Ri Bhoi

present_findings.finding: MSP-DPI correlation = 0.057. Moderate link between aging demographics and biometric maintenance burden.
present_findings.evidence: Districts with DPI > 0.6 have mean MSP = 8.968 vs national mean = 7.706

present_findings.finding: 78 districts show >50% persistence in top stress quartile, indicating structural problems, not temporary spikes.

administrative_suggestions.suggestion: Prioritize 629 districts with ESS > 75th percentile. Deploy mobile enrollment units and awareness campaigns.
administrative_suggestions.rationale: High ESS indicates delayed identity acquisition, creating exclusion risk.

administrative_suggestions.suggestion: Integrate Aadhaar enrollment with birth registration in 0 low-YCR districts.
administrative_suggestions.rationale: Low YCR means delayed youth enrollment, increasing future ESS burden.

administrative_suggestions.suggestion: Proactive biometric refresh campaigns in 745 high-MSP districts, especially for elderly populations.
administrative_suggestions.rationale: High MSP indicates authentication friction and potential failure risk.

administrative_suggestions.suggestion: Allocate resources to top 20 persistent-stress districts (persistence > 66.67%). These require sustained intervention, not one-time campaigns.
administrative_suggestions.rationale: Persistence index identifies structural problems requiring long-term solutions.

future_risks.description: Districts with high DPI (elderly share) currently show MSP = 8.968. As population ages, biometric maintenance burden will escalate.
future_risks.mitigation: Proactive biometric refresh programs before failure rates spike.

future_risks.description: 0 districts with low YCR will face adult enrollment backlog as current youth cohort ages without Aadhaar.
future_risks.mitigation: Immediate youth enrollment drive to prevent future ESS spike.
